New Records: Mohammad Rizwan recorded his 28th T20 fifty on the international stage with 56 runs from 38 balls.
Babar Azam contributed 75 runs from 42 balls, including five sixes and six fours.
Key Match Events: Pakistan achieved a decisive six-wicket win over Ireland in the series decider.
The second-wicket partnership of 139 between Rizwan and Azam was crucial to Pakistan's victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan responded from losing the opening match to win the series 2-1.
Ireland's total of 178 for seven included a second-wicket partnership of 85 between Andy Balbirnie and Lorcan Tucker.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shaheen Shah Afridi took three wickets for 14 runs in his four-over spell.
Harry Tector's late defiance with 30 runs could not prevent Pakistan from achieving the target.
